name: mediaman
tagline: Driving the now and next of digital business.
description: With more than 120 employees in Germany, China, and the USA, mediaman offers holistic solution for digital marketing on a global scale. mediaman creates a user-centric experience for our clients in the financial, automotive, industrial and pharmaceutical industries. Creative campaigns and social media activities are designed, planned and monitored to efficiently reach marketing goals.
